parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To give way, yield, submit. Apparently a primary verb; properly, to be weak, i.e. Yield.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Masculine Plural

str2: To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the same as euaggelizo; a good message, i.e. The gospel.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To remain, continue. From dia and meno; to stay constantly.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
